sections.content: Property developer GURNER^TM^ has announced it will build five ultra-luxury mega mansions as part of its [Huntingtower Place](https://www.gurner.com.au/project/huntingtower-place/) project.

With a project cost of $35 million, each home is inspired by the luxury estates of Los Angeles. They will be fully-customised by their future owners, and come with a starting price of $5.5 million. Two of the homes have already sold.
GURNER^TM^'s Design House is collaborating with Wolveridge Architects for the design, which will feature lots of natural light, soft hues and seamless links between indoor and outdoor spaces.

The largest property – dubbed "The Mansion" – will boast 4 bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, a sunken pool, a private chipping and putting green, and a 150 square metre main bedroom with living space, fireplace, outdoor spa and custom wardrobe. The asking price? A cool $14.5 million.
The project is slated to begin in September. It heralds the next evolution of GURNER^TM^ Boutique – which offers a bespoke service for high-end homes.
